sentences.sContent: What is the best part of being a computer programmer?
sentences.sCn: 成为一名计算机程序员最好的部分是什么？

sentences.sContent: What are some qualifications of a computer programmer?
sentences.sCn: 什么是计算机程序员应具备的条件？

sentences.sContent: The computer programmer botched (up) the job and had to start over.
sentences.sCn: 计算机程序设计员把文件弄坏了，只好重做。
